text:
Another #COVID19 #vaccine authorized in #Canada (#JnJ), w/10 million doses expected by Sept.
So when exactly is the "appropriate time" to at least plan for sharing vaccines w/others? Per Parliament's Standing Committee on Foreign Affairs & Int'l Development recommendations?🇨🇦💉🌐 https://t.co/fDV3QuVXeu https://t.co/DdFd1IJxvP
